items.sentence: Before we get started, let me ask a question.
The teacher rolled the TV into the classroom.
I'm convinced that I'm doing the right thing.
I keep telling Tom to listen, but he doesn't.
Tom glanced at his watch and got up to leave.
We've postponed our concert until next month.
Please tell me the reason that you were late.
How did you get such a large amount of money?
Tom doesn't like it when people stare at him.
Tom doesn't know where Mary's sunglasses are.
Tom doesn't know where Mary's ski gloves are.
Tom didn't want to tell Mary why he did that.
Tom didn't tell us how he planned to do that.
Tom didn't tell me how he planned to do that.
Tom didn't really want to do that by himself.
Tom didn't really have to be there yesterday.
Tom will do that next week or the week after.
Tom will be heading back to town after lunch.
Tom went to the pantry to get a can of beans.
Tom wasn't sure if he wanted Mary to do that.
